alert.note: Alert for Grand Traverse; Kalkaska (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 03 at 5:48PM EDT until August 03 at 6:30PM EDT by NWS Gaylord
info.description: The National Weather Service in Gaylord has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Grand Traverse County in northern Michigan... Kalkaska County in northern Michigan... * Until 630 PM EDT. * At 548 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Traverse City, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Traverse City, Kalkaska, Sharon, Kingsley, Fife Lake, Barker Creek, Sigma, Darragh, South Boardman, Grawn, Traverse City State Park, Spider Lake, Williamsburg, Greilickville, Bates and Smithville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
